GapFillInput.Title: Going out and staying in
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type one word in each gap.

Content.Question: On Saturday mornings Sam usually does the shopping and I usually do the housework, you know, the cleaning. Then in the afternoon sometimes we go for a walk or go to an exhibition in the town. In the evening we often go out for a meal or go to the cinema. We often watch a DVD. My son, Ben, often plays football in the afternoon and he usually goes out with a group of friends in the evening. He always comes home very late and on Sundays he often stays in bed until lunchtime! On Sundays, Sam and I usually stay at home and relax or sometimes we visit friends or relatives. Sometimes Sam goes away on business for the weekend and two or three times a year we spend the weekend away in another city or in the country.
